MIN_LENGTH: Field: [{property}] with value: [{value}] needs to be at least {constraints.0}
MAX_LENGTH: Field: [{property}] with value: [{value}] needs to be less than {constraints.0}
IS_SNAKE_CASE: Field: [{property}] should be in a snake case format
IS_HEX_COLOR: Field: [{property}] must be a hexadecimal color
IS_UPPER_CASE: Field: [{property}] must be in a upper case format
